description: Three DVD-only episodes made from the light novels, which flesh out characters and plot events from the original series and establish closure to the story as Carol and the Vice President return to New York.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

node.description:
__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryohgo_narita)__

_Ryougo Narita_ is a Japanese light novelist and manga writer. He won the Gold Prize in the 9th Dengeki Novel Prize for Baccano!, which was made into an anime television series in 2007. His series Durarara!! was also made into two anime television series, one airing in January 2010 and the second in January 2015.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Worked for Games Gurafikka company until 2003. Since 2004 working as a freelance illustrator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/enonami) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15820)

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B2%B8%E7%94%B0%E9%9A%86%E5%AE%8F)

Takahiro Kishida is an animator and renown character designer.

Kishida's designs are well received by animators and attract talent into shows easily. He is also praised for his shot composition skills and copies of his layouts are widely distributed in the industry as drawing reference. Nowadays he is mostly only credited for character design in the shows he participates in, but in reality he works as an animation director uncredited quite often. He rarely heavily corrects the key animator's cuts, strongly believing that the animators' distinctiveness should be noticeable.

Noted for his designs on shows like [Haikyuu](https://anilist.co/anime/20464/), [Serial Experiments Lain](https://anilist.co/anime/339/), [Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/), [Baccano](https://anilist.co/anime/2251/) and more.
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.
Yumi Satou is an Animation Producer who is affiliated with [Brain's Base](https://anilist.co/studio/112/Brains-Base).
_Note: Not to be confused with the [director](https://anilist.co/staff/132778/)._
__Naohiro Tafu__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. He currently works for the company Movic.

Kozue Kananiwa graduated from the HOSEI University of Tokyo, Faculty of Letters, Department of Japan Literature. Her first work as a producer was for [Oh! My Goddess](https://anilist.co/anime/50/Aa-Megamisama-TV/) in 2005.

Since, she participated in the production many renown series such as [Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/Mahou-Shoujo-MadokaMagica/) in 2011, [Steins;Gate](https://anilist.co/anime/9253/SteinsGate) the same year, or more recently [Horimiya](https://anilist.co/anime/124080/Horimiya/).

Now, she is the General Manager of  both U-NEXT Anime & Book Division and of the Production Department.

(Source : Bangumi 番組計画RC3)

__Other Names:__ KAORI

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/odakaori_0511)  

Joined the FictionJunction project in 2005.
